creator: faer@yahoo.com
text:
/bin/ant script incorrectly sets LOCALCLASSPATH in runned from CYGWIN which 
resulted in "class not found" error.

Solution:
ANT_LIB should be set after ANT_HOME is converted to unix format(see fragment 
below).
In the current version it set before.


# For Cygwin, ensure paths are in UNIX format before anything is touched
if $cygwin ; then
  [ -n "$ANT_HOME" ] &&
    ANT_HOME=`cygpath --unix "$ANT_HOME"`
  [ -n "$JAVA_HOME" ] &&
    JAVA_HOME=`cygpath --unix "$JAVA_HOME"`
  [ -n "$CLASSPATH" ] &&
    CLASSPATH=`cygpath --path --unix "$CLASSPATH"`
fi

# set ANT_LIB location
ANT_LIB=${ANT_HOME}/lib
